page.title: 08OCCUPATIONS
page.content: CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL WERE ASKED WHAT THEIR PARENTS DID FOR A LIVING. ALTOGETHER 100 CHILDREN WERE ASKED AND THE ANSWERS WERE DIVIDED INTO FATHER'S AND MOTHER'S OCCUPATIONS. THE SCHOOL WAS BUILT ON AN ESTATE THAT WAS MADE TO HOUSE PEOPLE WORKING IN LOCAL INDUSTRY,ESPECIALLY THE NEARBY LLANWERN STEELWORKS. A CUTTING DOWN ON THE WORKFORCE HAS MEANT A GREAT DEAL OF UNEMPLOYMENT AS MORE MODERN METHODS TAKE THE PLACE OF WORKERS. THIS IS REFLECTED IN THE FIGURES THAT WERE COLLECTED WITH 32% OF THE FATHERS BEING UNEMPLOYED. OF THE MOTHERS 36% WERE NOW WORKING, PROBABLY TO HELP IN THE RUNNING OF THE FAMILY. IT IS INTERESTING THAT ONLY 18% OF FATHERS NOW WORK IN INDUSTRY.
